kpi.name: m3036c0009

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF POSSIBLY DUPLICATE DRT REQUEST SENT
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of possibly duplicate DRT Request messages that have been sent to the charging gateway. UPDATED: This counter is incremented when the possibly duplicate DRT Request message is sent to the charging gateway.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF POSSIBLY DUPLICATE DRT REQUEST SENT
